review: Super easy to set up, even for those not tech savvy. Not as intuitive to use, because you have to have the compatible apps, and they aren't many - YET! Hoping Google adds more. For now, I use this with no problem for YouTube, Pandora and Netflix. It's faster than using the smart TV settings, and faster than going through the PS3.As of this review, you cannot stream from Chrome apps on either iTunes or Androids, only from Chrome on a PC (after downloading an extension program). I'll give it 5 stars when you can stream any video played on Chrome from a mobile device.

All this thing does is is allow one to drag and drop any video into the chrome browser and have it play on the device that it is plugged into. There appears to be allot of compression going on as well so don't expect your HD collection to look all that great.
